Can we deduce the original vector \\( z_0 \\) at t = 0 after observing \\( z(t) \\) at t = T without knowing whether \\( h(z) \\) was applied?

Without knowing the use of \\( h(z) \\), multiple initial conditions \\( z_0 \\) or transformations could lead to the same observed \\( z(T) \\), making it impossible to uniquely determine \\( z_0 \\).
